text: (Nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷē!) Nayavañcakarkaḷaip paṟṟi nīṅkaḷ ēṉ iruvakai karuttuk koḷkiṟīrkaḷ? Avarkaḷ ceyta tīṅkiṉ kāraṇamāka allāh avarkaḷait talai kuṉiyumpaṭi ceytāṉ. Evarkaḷai allāh tavaṟāṉa vaḻiyil cella viṭṭuviṭṭāṉō avarkaḷai nīṅkaḷ nērāṉa vaḻiyil celutta virumpukiṟīrkaḷō? (Atu muṭiyāta kāriyam! Ēṉeṉṟāl napiyē!) Evarai allāh vaḻitavaṟa viṭṭu viṭṭāṉō avarukku (mīṭci peṟṟut tara) oru vaḻiyaiyum nīr kāṇamāṭṭīr
